speakers.name: Satya Nadella
speakers.title: CEO
speakers.bio: Satya Nadella is the CEO of Microsoft, leading the company's transformation in cloud computing and artificial intelligence.

speakers.name: Fei-Fei Li
speakers.title: Professor of Computer Science
speakers.bio: Dr. Li is a pioneer in AI and computer vision, co-director of Stanford's Human-Centered AI Institute, and former Chief Scientist at Google Cloud.

speakers.name: Jensen Huang
speakers.title: CEO and Co-founder
speakers.bio: Jensen Huang co-founded NVIDIA, revolutionizing computing with GPU technology and advancing AI capabilities.

speakers.name: Sam Altman
speakers.title: CEO
speakers.topic: The Future of Artificial General Intelligence
speakers.bio: Sam Altman leads OpenAI, driving breakthrough developments in artificial intelligence and language models.

speakers.name: Reshma Saujani
speakers.title: Founder
speakers.topic: Diversity in Tech and Coding Education
speakers.bio: Reshma Saujani founded Girls Who Code, working to close the gender gap in technology and transform the industry.

speakers.name: Marc Andreessen
speakers.title: Co-founder
speakers.topic: Future of Tech Investment and Innovation
speakers.bio: Marc Andreessen is a pioneer of the web browser, co-founder of Netscape, and leading technology investor.
